title: roonlagoon
author: roonlagoon
content: Hello,I'm selling a script for 2 Bovada minigames(football runner/crypto miner). After winning over 10k in giftcards/crypto I was banned from competing in the minigames.I am now selling a script which allows you to upload any score to either leaderboard and win awesome prizes, without actually playing the game!Both games pay out weekly cash/giftcard/freeplay rewards, Week 18 for football runner will pay out prizes like "Signed Tom Brady Jersey" and "24” iMac w/ 4.5k Retina Display"Will provide proof and upload a test score for you to prove legitimacy. Check out the full list of prizes below!https://www.bovada.lv/crypto-minerhttps://www.bovada.lv/football-runner-gameDM me on discord for details - legograde32Thanks so much!

comments.author: MadHatters
comments.body: Of course the following accounts that use tools can also be banned, it is not worth the risk

comments.author: roonlagoon
comments.body: Quote from: MadHatters on November 27, 2023, 06:40:32 PMOf course the following accounts that use tools can also be banned, it is not worth the riskI only got "banned" aka the forum moderators manually remove my scores if I submit now, I can still fully use bovada in every other capacity.There is no risk involvedAlso I'll upload a free score for anyone interested for football runner this week, to test out the service.

comments.author: Meghannmoonshine
comments.body: I added you as a friend on discord.

comments.author: roonlagoon
comments.body: add me on discord for more info

comments.author: roonlagoon
comments.body: Football runner and crypto miner scores availible today, make ~2k in the next week, dm me on discord.

comments.author: roonlagoon
comments.body: Final Day of Football Runner on Bovada add me on discord for availible prizes.For Week 18, the top 10 players will win one of these prizes:Signed Tom Brady JerseySigned Patrick Mahomes Jersey12.9” iPad Pro (Space Gray)NFL Blitz Arcade MachineLG 48” 4K OLED UHD Television24” iMac w/ 4.5k Retina DisplayAirPods Max Space GrayApple Watch Series 8 GPSViewSonic Full HD Curved Gaming LED MonitorHERO11 Black Action Camera
